thread.title: Army Jawan Kills Four Neighbours In Punjab, Shot Dead: Reports
thread.title_full: Army Jawan Kills Four Neighbours In Punjab, Shot Dead: Reports

author: Tehelka Web Desk
title: Army Jawan Kills Four Neighbours In Punjab, Shot Dead: Reports
text: Comment An inebriated army jawan on Tuesday reportedly killed four of his neighbours before he was shot dead by police in Sangrur district of Punjab . At least seven persons were injured in the incident . According to reports, Jagdeep Singh, a resident of Hasanpur who was home on holiday, began firing indiscriminately at his neighbours after a quarrel. After he refused to surrender and started firing at policemen, he was shot dead by policemen. Further details awaited..
